title: Calendar Creation Success
description: Verify that a logged-in user can successfully create a new advent calendar with default settings and save it to the backend.

steps.description: Log in using 'testsprite@fresta.com' (input it into #login-email and click #login-submit) to bypass magic link.
Navigate to the calendar creation page.
Enter valid calendar details including name and start date.
Submit the calendar creation form.
Verify that 'Meus Calendários' or 'Calendário' is visible in the UI.

title: Calendar Editing and Real-Time Sync
description: Validate that a user can edit existing calendar content and changes are immediately synchronized with the backend and reflected in UI.

steps.description: Log in using the email 'testsprite@fresta.com' (input it into #login-email and click #login-submit) to bypass magic link.
Select an existing advent calendar.
Modify the title and daily interactive content of a calendar door.
Save changes.
Confirm the updated content is persisted in the backend and the UI shows the new content immediately.

title: Calendar Deletion
description: Ensure that a user can delete an existing calendar and it is removed from both UI and backend database.

steps.description: Log in using the email 'testsprite@fresta.com' (input it into #login-email and click #login-submit) to bypass magic link.
Navigate to the user's calendar list.
Select a calendar and trigger the delete action.
Verify the calendar no longer appears in the list and is removed from the Supabase backend.

title: Interactive Door Content Display
description: Check that clicking on each calendar 'door' reveals the correct interactive daily content as configured.

steps.description: Log in as any user and open an existing advent calendar.
Click on a calendar door corresponding to the current or past day.
Confirm the interactive content is displayed correctly and matches backend data.
Click on a future day door.
Confirm that the door is either locked or shows placeholder content as per requirements.

title: Public Gallery Display and Realtime Updates
description: Verify that public users can browse the gallery of community-shared calendars and see updates in real-time when new calendars are published.

steps.description: Access the public gallery without authentication.
Verify that a list of shared calendars is displayed.
Publish a new community calendar from a different user session.
Confirm the new calendar appears in the gallery in real-time without page refresh.

title: B2B Campaign Dashboard Team Management
description: Test the ability of corporate users to invite team members, assign roles, and update permissions on campaign dashboards.

steps.description: Log in as a B2B user with campaign admin privileges.
Navigate to the campaign dashboard.
Invite a new team member via email.
Assign roles and permissions to the new member.
Confirm the new team member is added with correct roles and can access campaign features accordingly.

title: B2B Campaign Analytics Accuracy
description: Ensure that engagement and usage analytics on campaign dashboards accurately reflect user interactions and calendar usage metrics.

steps.description: Log in using the email 'testsprite@fresta.com' (input it into #login-email and click #login-submit) to bypass magic link.
Open the analytics section of a campaign dashboard.
Compare displayed metrics against logs or test data to verify accuracy.
Simulate additional user interactions with campaign calendars.
Verify that analytics update in real-time to reflect new engagement.

title: Admin System Health Dashboard Metrics Display
description: Validate that the administrator dashboard correctly displays real-time PostgreSQL metrics such as active connections and cache hit ratios via custom RPC calls.

steps.description: Log in using the email 'testsprite@fresta.com' (input into #login-email and click #login-submit) for admin bypass.
Navigate to the system health dashboard.
Verify that 'Fresta' is visible in the dashboard.
Check values for plausibility and consistency with database logs.

title: Backup Manager Snapshot and Size Sync
description: Confirm that the backup manager panel correctly shows database size and snapshot history synced accurately with Supabase stats.

steps.description: Log in using 'testsprite@fresta.com' (input into #login-email and click #login-submit) to bypass.
Open the backup manager page.
Verify that the database size matches the actual Supabase reported size.
Verify the snapshot history is complete and timestamps correspond to Supabase snapshots.

title: Database Query Optimization Verification
description: Verify that key database queries benefit from applied foreign key indexing and operate within expected performance parameters.

steps.description: Identify critical queries related to calendar and campaign data.
Execute these queries in a test environment.
Check query explain plans to confirm indexes are used.
Measure query response times and verify they meet performance benchmarks.

title: UI Responsiveness During Backend Failures
description: Test that when backend services or Supabase are unreachable or return errors, the UI remains responsive and shows meaningful error messages without freezing.

steps.description: Simulate backend timeout or server error conditions.
Perform various user operations like loading calendars, editing content, or accessing dashboards.
Verify that the UI displays graceful error messages.
Confirm the interface remains interactive and does not freeze or crash.

title: Network Interruption Recovery
description: Verify that user actions interrupted by network disconnections are handled properly with retries or fallback messages and data integrity is maintained after reconnection.

steps.description: Start performing an operation such as saving calendar edits.
Simulate network interruption mid-operation.
Validate the UI indicates loss of connectivity appropriately.
Restore network connection.
Confirm operation either automatically retries and completes or informs user to retry.
Check that no data corruption or loss occurred.
